feed.title: bknd Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.1.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • hotfix: cookies may not be added to static assets by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/8

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added astro adapter @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/5 & https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/9

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • export data prototype by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/16
  • remove the quick theme switcher if admin settings are overridden by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/15
  • Remove unusued deps and fixing auth tests by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/12

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: lodash-es/* imports causing crash on astro by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/18

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Official docker image by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/11
  • Refactor: Module Manager by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/19
  • Refactor: Improve dependencies by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/21
  • Refactor: Improved Admin basepath by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/22
  • Improved and simplified bun/node adapters by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/23

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3.0
